column4: I installed ubuntu dual boot vista. Now my internet connection is too slow. It went down from 20Mbps to 3Mbps. Can anyone help?
I am using Ubuntu Hardy 8.04. Connection slow, on Ubuntu and Vista. Same thing.
Hello Histo. You helped me yesterday with Compiz.
Thank you.
Do you know what can cause a slow connection
Now that i am on Ubuntu
Histo, Since I installed Ubuntu. My connection went down from 20mbps to 3mbps. I am running Dual Boot Windows Vista and Ubuntu Hardy 8.04
Yes.
Also did Speedtest.net
Histo: Maybe I should reinstall my network adapter?
sometimes sites like www.speedtestnet.net cache's the file. so when you refresh then it basically gives your the speed read from the hdd.. not the site. so its giving you an inaccurate display.
I download from newsgroups. Giganews.com
my download is 2400kbs
yes, Histo.
On windows speed is a little higher than on Ubuntu
My download was 2400 now its 500
its a big difference. from 2400 KB's to 500 KB's
Thanks for trying Histo.
I am going to uninstall my network adapters and reinstall them with fresh drivers
i 2nd histo.. but it could be many thing.s
maybe that will clean everything up
check how the cables are laying in relation to other cables physically
